edu.mines.jtk.interp

Class RadialGridder2

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mines.jtk.interp.RadialInterpolator2
      • edu.mines.jtk.interp.RadialGridder2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Gridder2

    public class RadialGridder2
extends RadialInterpolator2
implements Gridder2
    Gridding by interpolation with radial basis functions. This class exists only to implement the interface Gridder2. It otherwise adds no significant functionality to its base class RadialInterpolator2.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class edu.mines.jtk.interp.RadialInterpolator2

        Constructs a gridder with specified known (scattered) samples.
        Parameters:
        basis - the radial basis function.
        f - array of known sample values f(x1,x2).
        x1 - array of known sample x1 coordinates.
        x2 - array of known sample x2 coordinates.

      • grid

        public float[][] grid(Sampling s1,
             Sampling s2)
        Computes gridded sample values from the known sample values. Before interpolating, this method sets the bounds to be consistent with the first and last values of the specified samplings, so that interpolated values will never be null.
        Specified by:
        grid in interface Gridder2
        Parameters:
        s1 - sampling of x1.
        s2 - sampling of x2.
        Returns:
        array of gridded sample values.
